turns.content:
simplify these instructions: Here’s How It Works! (Registration coming soon)

1. Choose your Challenge. Click here for some Challenge suggestions.

2. FUNdraise for Commonpoint Queens by creating your own fundraising page with a picture and personal message to friends and family, sharing your challenge goal and why you are fundraising to support Commonpoint Queens’ programs and resources.

Click button below.
While in the page, click “Create my own fundraising page!” on the right side of the form.
You will receive two emails. The first one will be an image you can share to promote your fundraising page. The second email will include a link to your personal page so you can personalize your page.
Don’t forget to personalize your page before you forward it to your network! When you are in your page and have personalized it, just copy the URL and share it with your network on social media, email or via text with a personal message.
Tag Commonpoint Queens and include the hashtag #CommonpointChallenge

To participate in the Commonpoint Challenge:

1. Select a challenge and check out the suggestions by clicking the link.
2. Create your fundraising page to support Commonpoint Queens by clicking the button below and following the instructions. You'll add a picture, a personal message, and your challenge goal.
3. You will receive two emails. The first email will contain an image to promote your fundraising page, and the second email will have a link to your personalized page.
4. Personalize your page before sharing it with your network. You can share the link on social media, email, or text with a personal message. Don't forget to tag Commonpoint Queens and use the hashtag #CommonpointChallenge.

simplify this text: he Commonpoint Challenge is similar to a walkathon, but you get to choose your own challenge activity and complete it anywhere, any time between April 1 - April 21, 2023. 

100% of all proceeds will provide critical financial support for the programs and services that help our community. It is because of supporters like YOU that we can provide the food, mental health services, employment support, and so much more to our friends and neighbors.

Prizes for the top three fundraisers!

The Commonpoint Challenge is a fundraising event where you choose your own activity to complete between April 1 and April 21, 2023. All proceeds go towards supporting the programs and services of Commonpoint Queens.

The top three fundraisers will receive prizes. Your support is crucial in helping provide essential resources such as food, mental health services, and employment support to the community.

simplify the following text: The Commonpoint Challenge is similar to a walkathon, but you get to choose your own challenge activity and complete it anywhere, any time between April 1 - April 21, 2023. 

100% of all proceeds will provide critical financial support for the programs and services that help our community. It is because of supporters like YOU that we can provide the food, mental health services, employment support, and so much more to our friends and neighbors.

Prizes for the top three fundraisers!

Learn more and view our Challenge suggestions: CommonpointQueens.org/Challenge

Don't forget to Post your Challenge Stories and tag Commonpoint Queens using hashtag #CommonpointChallenge

The Commonpoint Challenge is a fundraiser where you choose your own activity to do between April 1 and April 21, 2023. All money raised supports the programs and services that help the community, such as food, mental health services, and employment support.

The top three fundraisers will receive prizes. To learn more and see challenge suggestions, go to CommonpointQueens.org/Challenge. Share your challenge stories and tag Commonpoint Queens using the hashtag #CommonpointChallenge.
